Applied Catalysis A: General, 509 (2016) 30 Well-dispersed Pt on TiO2: A highly active and selective catalyst for hydrogenation of 3-nitroacetophenone Xingchun Yin, Daiping He, Ping Jiang, Gongbing Zhou, Hu Chen, Yan Deng Key Lab of Green Synthesis and Applications, College of Chemistry, Chongqing Normal University, Chongqing 401331, China 100% selectivity to 3-aminoacetophenone could be obtained from 3-nitroacetophenone hydrogenation over the Pt/TiO2. The catalytic activity of the Pt/TiO2 for 3-nitroacetophenone hydrogenation is almost 45 times higher than that of the Rh/SiO2. The results presented here highlight the great potential of the Pt/TiO2 catalyst in the selective hydrogenation of nitroacetophenones on a large scale.
